idea: OnlyPlanet.in hosts a tool - an online calculator to measure the impact of individual lifestyle choices on the planet, also known as personal carbon footprint. 96% of people surveyed are unaware of this term. After knowing your personal carbon footprint, users will take on challenge to reduce a ton of carbon footprint via program (yet to build) by adopting choices in day-to-day life that save time, save money, and add up to transparent, measurable impact that is to scale at community level eventually.
name: OnlyPlanet.in

idea: We are a start-up focused on delivering health care at the doorstep by pharmacies in a hyperlocal model using portable health ATMs, with a vision to reach within 2 km of every citizen in top 100 smart cities in India. Our offerings will substantially reduce cost of healthcare and improve access. The company has been conceptualized and set up during the Covid lockdown by 2 automation Gurus with combined experience of more than 50 years in India, ME & Africa !! Our first offering is a health ATM for Corporates to install for checking their employees' health and disinfection, and helps them get back to business post Covid !
name: AUTWN PRIVATE LIMITED
